menu.goaway: Como eu tenho coisas para fazer, eu vou dar uma volta enquanto tu decides-te. Chama-me de novo quando te decidires.
menu.chargeB: _da tua conta. Eu volto em um minuto com a tua encomenda! Ok?

nuke.confirm:
:radioactive: **__Isto vai resetar todas as definições do servidor, incluindo:__**
```
 -Prefixo
 -ModRoles
 -Comandos e módulos ligados/desligados
 -Deixar cair Rubys vai ficar DESLIGADO
 -Mensagens de LevelUP vão ficar LIGADAS
 -Reações personalizadas vão ser limpas
 -Canais de logs
```
 -Este nuke vai ser notificado no meu servidor de suporte, para todos verem a merda que tu fizeste.
 -Tu não poderás fazer nuke por 48 horas, e se abusares deste comando, eu decido se tu estás a abusar ou não. Abuso recorrente e eu bloqueio o comando no servidor.


 **Queres MESMO que eu mande nukes?** 
 Envia **ok** para sim, **c** para cancelar.
nuke.confirmB:
**Escreve a razão do nuke em baixo para confimar**
Envia **c** para cancelar.
nuke.completed: As informações do servidor foram completamente limpas e resetadas. Tenta usar **+serverinfo** para ver se tudo foi resetado bem. Eu não sou responsável por alguma contaminação de Fallout Nuclear.

shop.timeout: Pensas de mais! Volta quando souberes o que comprar.

usage.logs:
`{{prefix}}logs #canal`
 Define todas as logs no canal escolhido

`{{prefix}}logs mod #canal`
 Define logs de moderação (Kick, Ban e Mute) no canal escolhido

`{{prefix}}logs atv #canal`
 Define logs de atividade (Entrada e saída de membros, mudança de nicks) no canal escolhido

`{{prefix}}logs adv #canal`
 Define logs avançadas (Mensagens editadas e apagadas, canais criados, ativação ou desativação de módulos) no canal escolhido

`{{prefix}}logs mod #canal delete`
Logs não irão ser mais enviadas neste canal
usage.ahegao: Muito símples, apenas escreve `{{prefix}}ahegao` e tu ganhas um アヘ顔
usage.announce: `{{prefix}}announce [mensagem a anunciar]` Ex.: `{{prefix}}annouce Hoje vou dar donuts grátis!`
usage.balance: `{{prefix}}balance` If you think using this command is too hard, don't even try.
usage.disable:
`{{prefix}}disable [command or módule] [scope]`
 Disable specific commands or modules within the desired scope. (Channel or Server)

`{{prefix}}disable nsfw c`
 Disable the commands from NSFW module at the Channel (c).

`{{prefix}}disable say s`
 Disable the `{{prefix}}say` command in the entire Server (s).
usage.drop:
`{{prefix}}drop [X]`
 and good luck for the quickest. Whoever types `{{prefix}}pick` first gets 'em all!
usage.enable:
`{{prefix}}enable [command or módule] [scope]`
 Enable specific commands or modules within the desired scope. (Channel or Server)

`{{prefix}}enable nsfw c`
 Enable the commands from NSFW module at the Channel (c).

`{{prefix}}enable say s`
 Enable the `{{prefix}}say` command in the entire Server (s).
usage.give: `{{prefix}}give [X] @someguy` to give X Rubines to your buddy.
usage.kick:
`{{prefix}}kick @someguy [reason]`
Kicks @someguy from the Server, reason is optional, for cases of advanced moderation needs.
usage.pick: I guess you are smart enough to figure how to use this by yourself.
usage.prefixSet:
`{{prefix}}prefixSet [prefix]` and be careful to not mess shit up.
Example: `{{prefix}}prefixSet pol.`
usage.profile: `{{prefix}}profile` for your own `{{prefix}}profile @someguy` for someone else's Profilecard
usage.cash:
`{{prefix}}cash`,`{{prefix}}Rubine`,`{{prefix}}$`
 You can also @mention someone to check on their Rubines
usage.switch: `{{prefix}}switch [X]` Choose wisely and do not abuse.
usage.invite: You just needed to NOT include HELP in the fucking command...
usage.cashrank:
`{{prefix}}cashrank` or `{{prefix}}Rubinerank` = Global
`{{prefix}}cashrank server` or `{{prefix}}Rubinerank server` = Server Only
usage.rule34:
`{{prefix}}rule34 [tags]`
For spacing use  _ :`{{prefix}}rule34 blue_hair`
 For multiple tags use + :`{{prefix}}rule34 blue_hair+pointy_ears`
For filtering a certain tag, use - before it: `{{prefix}}rule34 blue_hair+pointy_ears+-furry`
usage.safe:
`{{prefix}}safe[tags]`
For spacing use  _ :`{{prefix}}safe blue_hair`
 For multiple tags use + :`{{prefix}}safe blue_hair+pointy_ears`
For filtering a certain tag, use - before it: `{{prefix}}safe blue_hair+pointy_ears+-furry`
usage.ping: You REALLY need help for a PING command? Ohforfuckssake
usage.betflip:
`{{prefix}}betflip X [heads | tails]` Remember that is HEADS or TAILS in the Language you've set me into!
Example:`{{prefix}}betflip 5 heads`
Minimum bet is 3 Rubines
usage.ban:
`{{prefix}}ban @someguy [reason]`
Bans @someguy from the Server, reason is optional, for advanced moderation needs.
usage.autorole:
`{{prefix}}autorole [add | rem | list] [Role| @role]` 

`{{prefix}}autorole add Games` Allows the **Games** Role as self-assignable.
`{{prefix}}autorole rem Games` Removes the role **Games** da lista.
`{{prefix}}autorole list` Shows the list and commands for each Self-Assignable Role

 Type the Role name exactly as registered, case sensitive. Or just @mention it
usage.background:
`{{prefix}}background [Imagecode]`

 :warning: **IMPORTANT:** 
*Imagecode* __are not links__, are codes obtained from http://www.pollux.fun/bgshop. 

Example: `{{prefix}}background IlyEEDBj0GLLlFl8n6boPLSkADNuBwke`
usage.bye:
`{{prefix}}bye [msg|timer] [mensagem|segundos]` 

`{{prefix}}bye msg Goodbye %user% !`
 Changes the message to "Goodbye @User !"

`{{prefix}}bye timer 10`
 Set a time in seconds for auto deletion, 0 for keep it forever.

`{{prefix}}bye`
Without any parameters, this command will toggle on and off the emittion of messages.

**Wildcards**:
`%user%` Mentions the user.
`%username%` Outputs the user's name, without mention.
usage.welcome:
`{{prefix}}welcome [msg|timer] [mensagem|segundos]` 

`{{prefix}}welcome  msg Welcome %user% !`
 Changes the message to "Welcome @User !"

`{{prefix}}welcome timer 10`
 Set a time in seconds for auto deletion, 0 for keep it forever.

`{{prefix}}welcome `
Without any parameters, this command will toggle on and off the emittion of messages.

**Wildcards**:
`%user%` Mentions the user.
`%username%` Outputs the user's name, without mention.
usage.clear:
`{{prefix}}clear X`
**Attention** X must be __Greater than 1__ and __Lower than 101__.
Basic maths, I know you can get this straight!
usage.equip:
`{{prefix}}equip`
And then click the reactions to navigate, be sure to let them load before go clickin'
usage.fausto:
`{{prefix}}faustão`
 Needs the MANAGE WEBHOOKS permission to work.
usage.puto: Only available on the following languages: [PT-BR]
usage.menesueco: Only available on the following languages: [PT-BR]
usage.otaco: Only available on the following languages: [PT-BR]
usage.pasquale: Only available on the following languages: [PT-BR]
usage.morse: `{{prefix}}morse [text]` You should be in a voice channel
usage.read:
`{{prefix}}read` Gets last image posted if available on cache
`{{prefix}} read [ url|image attachment ]` Reads text contained on an image attached or linked
usage.roll:
`{{prefix}}roll [Amount][d[Faces]][extra operations]`
`{{prefix}}roll d20` `{{prefix}}roll 5d6` `{{prefix}}roll 150d12` `{{prefix}}roll 10d4 + 8` `{{prefix}}roll d12 - 10` `{{prefix}}roll 60d7 / 7` `{{prefix}}roll 1d100*5`

 Add thrill to your rolls by adding some delay in seconds: `{{prefix}}roll 1d20 -t 5`
usage.medal:
`{{prefix}}medal [medal_id]` or just `{{prefix}}medal`
 For example: `{{prefix}}medal darkmagirl` for the **Dark Magician Girl** medal.
usage.exchange:
`{{prefix}}exchange [Amount] [Destination Currency Code]` 
e.g `{{prefix}}exchange 28 DUT` Exchanges 28 Rubines into DueUtil Credits.
usage.daily:
`{{prefix}}daily` to get your daily bonus, streak 10 days in a row for a higher bonus1
 `{{prefix}}daily epoch` to check how much time until next global refresh.
usage.selfroles:
`{{prefix}}selfroles [add | del | list] [Role| @role | Role ID] ["Shorthand"]` 

`{{prefix}}selfroles add Games` Allows the **Games** Role as self-assignable.
`{{prefix}}selfroles del Games` Removes the role **Games** from the list.
`{{prefix}}selfroles list` Shows the list and commands for each Self-Assignable Role

 These are Case insensitive, you can use Role ID too.
`{{prefix}}selfroles clear` Deletes **all** selfroles from the list.
usage.prune:
`{{prefix}}prune X [@user | user ID]`
You can use the user's ID if mentioning is not available, as in `{{prefix}}prune 50 271394014358405121`, If no user is specified, it defaults to Pollux's messages.

**Attention** X must be __Greater than 1__ and __Lower than 101__.
Basic maths, I know you can get this straight!

website.nukedes:
This will wipe EVERY server-specific options and settings, achievements, bank items, cherry modules and all custom stuff and data will be lost forever, there's no way to revert this.
Only the server owner can use issue a nuke.

blackjack.newgame: Time to play some Blackjack, I guess you know the rules, so let's get started.
blackjack.hit: Respond with `hit` to draw one more card,
blackjack.double: `double down` to double your bet and draw one last card,
blackjack.even: We broke even, in that case the house wins~ Your Rubines stay with me.

lootDrop.1: HEY GUYS! A Lootbox has just spawned at this Channel!

event.treatRefresh:
No no no! You already got your candies, shoo!
You can come back in **{{remaining}}**
event.current_event:
Hey~ Did you know there is a global **Halloween Event** going on? :jack_o_lantern:
In this event you can get some cool and __exclusive__ pretty stuff for your `p!profile` card!
Available only during this event, which will be running until **November 5th**
More info at <http://pollux.fun/events/haloween> *(page in english)*
*Contact your Server Owner to check if this server is participating*
event.current_eventforMasters:
Hey~ Excuse me, did you know there is a global **Halloween Event** going on? :jack_o_lantern:
In this event people can get some cool and __exclusive__ pretty stuff for their`p!profile` cards!
Available only during this event, which will be running until **November 5th**
More info at <http://pollux.fun/events/haloween> *(page in english)*

You, as a Server Owner, if interested in participating in the event with your community, can answer this message with an `halloween` so I know you're in! You will receive **five** Event Lootboxes, plus **one** for every 100 members on your server(s), capping at 15.
These can be used as rewards to any self-hosted events you may run, or just to raffle amongst your members.
I trust you to not use these for self advantage, either way, Event Lootbox usage will be logged just in case to protect those who want to play fairly~

Some Servers are not eligible for auto-joining the event. Which are:
 - Servers created after a certain date;
 - Servers in which I joined after October 1st;
 - Servers with bot x human users ratio exceeds 10%

 If your server fits in any of these, but it is a legit community server wanting to participate, join my Support Server and speak to my Developer for help, and eventually a Whitelisting of your server.

Here are some quick instructions for the commands involved in this event:
 - `p!trickortreat` : This is like dailies, but usable once a day in every participating server i'm in. Collect candies and get ranked, the top ranked users will get goodies from myself at the end of the event in **November 5th, 3PM EDT**.
 - `p!trade box @someone` Use this to award boxes to someone.
 - `p!lootbox` Check the lootboxes in your inventory, Event Boxes are opened responding with `open EV`.

Any further questions, bugs, or anything. Join the Support Server and spill it out (you can find it with `p!help`)

**Stay Spooky and Happy Halloween!** :heart:
event.newAccOut: :warning: Sorry, new accounts cannot participate. But join me in another event!~
event.newServer: New Servers cannot participate in this event. Contact the Developer or join the Support Server if you want to participate in the event with this Server
event.newJoin: This Server cannot participate in this event because I've joined here after October 1st. Contact the Developer or join the Support Server if you want to participate in the event with this Server
event.nextThis: You can Trick or Treat here again at:
event.candiesCheck: You collected **{{amt}}** candies so far. Keep knocking at servers to get more!
event.candieRank: These are the most candy-rich guys around the block.
event.candyprize: The best ranked users will get some nice rewards at the end of the event!
event.yourpos: Your position in the rank is:
event.droprates: This Server's Event Box drop rate has been increased by **{{amount}}x**
event.bori_receive: Borealis received **{{herKeys}} Keys** %EMJ% from this Server
event.absentElf: Seems like {{elfie}} is not around, try again later.
event.shopUpdate:
{{role2}} {{role1}}:
 The trader has **new items** in stock!
event.noFunds_key: Hmmm... seems that you don't have enough Keys
event.austra_buy: Is that the item you'd like? For **{{price}}** Winding Keys it can be all yours! Deal?
event.austra_checkout: **Done!** It has been a great pleasure doing business with you~!
event.austra_noFunds: Sorry, we're both wasting our times here. You don't have enough Keys for that. But I can give it to you anyways if you give me **{{rubAmount}}** Rubines.
event.austra_ultimatePoverty: ...which appearantly you don't have either. Shoo!
event.austra_exg: I can exchange my Keys for a fair amount of your Rubines, but I'm much more interested on Keys.Use commands like these to exchange with me:
event.help_elf: Checks if there are elves around
event.australis_bio: Australis is the elf of Midsummer Xmas, at Santa's southern assembly lines. Since Santa doesn't supervise them, she does anything on her reach to get the lost Winding Keys, even sneaking goodies and reselling them for a much lower price
event.borealis_bio: Borealis is a young part-time elf from Santa's main assembly lines at the North Pole. She volunteered to help finding the lost Winding Keys. She's one of Santa's favorite apprendices, for that reason, he takes her suggestions quite seriously.
event.au_function: Australis trades Items from shops for Winding Keys, the Rarity Tier chances of the items depends on how much keys she has.
event.bo_function: Borealis collects Winding Keys and take them back to Santa, the Drop Rate of Event Lootboxes are increased significantly depending on how much keys she has.
event.elfAppears:
{{notify_roles}}:
One of Santa's elves just spawned at this server!
**{{aust_or_borea}}** will be here for {{amount}} hours. Use `{{prefix}}{{elf}}` to talk to her.
event.automessage:
**PolluXmas Global Event Info**
This channel will be used to post event updates for this Server.

Updates include:
  - *Santa's elfs Spawns*
  - *New items on the Trader Elf*
  - *Drop Rate updates from Collector Elf*

There are three Utility Roles for this event, get them if you want to be notified.
{{genericRole}} - for **all** updates.
{{austri}} - for **trader** updates.
{{bori}} - for **collector** updates.
event.traderElfText:
I need some Winding Keys that were lost from Santa's Factory did you see any?
**I can exchange them for some neat goodies!**
event.collectorElfText:
I'm Collecting lost Winding Keys around servers, did you see any?
**With these keys we will be able to deliver Present Boxes faster to your server!**

langIntro.global: I'll now speak English for this Server as the true cosmopolitan lady I am!
langIntro.channel: At this Channel I'll be speaking English for you~

info.checkPin: Check the Pinned Message for more Info
info.reactThis: React to this message to auto-receive the roles
